channel.title: The Queen [Unknown Special]
channel.description:
## *"You thought you would rule as the sole monarch.. but you forgot about family"*
> # The Queen [Unknown Special] > > ## Passives > **Tenacity** - Occupy and Redirect Immune > (BD Queen Only) **Loyal Subjects** - If the starting BD Queen is executed during a trial, the court cannot make treason accusations for one day. > > ## Day Abilities > **Grand Trial** - Only you and your treason nomination may be nominated for treason. (*3 uses*) > **Influence Fate** - Your vote to pardon or execute the accused will count twice. (*2 uses*) > > ## Night Abilities > **Guards!** Have a guard protect you, granting you death immunity for the night. (*3 uses (BD)* / *2 uses*(Evil)) > (BD Queen Only, Starting Queen Only) **Royal Scout** - Determine if a player possesses royal blood. If they do, you will also know if they are Blue Dragon or not. (*2 uses*) > (Evil Queen Only, Starting Queen Only) **Bastard Scout** - Determine if a player possesses royal blood. If they do, remove their royal blood passive from them along with determining their faction. They cannot regain this passive, but will still appear royal to any classes that can check for royalty. (*2 uses*)
## The Butler will have a choice on which highest royal they would like to poison ## The Queen has a 50% chance of existing in any game. If they do not exist, no elections for Queen will be held.

item.title: The Queen [Unknown Special]
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
That doesn’t fix the problem. The problem is how it takes up another slot in the actual game. It theoretically could work if the game size was increased (new sfol idea) but I don’t think it works here if you don’t give it a 50/50 chance of spawning.

For example, evil king and evil queen spawns.

Read full topic

item.title: The Queen [Unknown Special]
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
Generally you need to edit the OP. The forum keeps a record of edits if they aren’t quick edits (like a few moments after posting). No editing is for forum games for integrity reasons but outside of it it’s fine to use. To edit click the pencil underneath the post you want to edit. It will have an orange pencil on it so everyone knows it was edited.

Read full topic

item.title: The Queen [Unknown Special]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

(Evil Queen Only, Starting Queen Only) Bastard Scout - Determine if a player possesses royal blood. If they do, remove their royal blood passive from them. They cannot regain this passive. ( 1 use )

Old Wording

(Evil Queen Only, Starting Queen Only) Bastard Scout - Determine if a player possesses royal blood. If they do, remove their royal blood passive from them. They cannot regain this passive, but will still appear royal to any classes that can check for royalty. ( 2 uses )

New wording.

item.title: The Queen [Unknown Special]
item.dc:creator: MathBlade
item.description:
Bastard Scout and Royal Scout need to have the same number of uses otherwise it becomes a meta game of “Royal Scout” twice and the EK has to know someone else’s class or gets outed.

Read full topic

item.title: The Queen [Unknown Special]
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
“You thought you would rule as the sole monarch… but you forgot about family”

The Queen [Unknown Special]

Passives

Tenacity - Occupy and Redirect Immune
(BD Queen Only) Loyal Subjects - If the starting BD Queen is executed during a trial, the court cannot make treason accusations for one day.

Day Abilities

Grand Trial - Only you and your treason nomination may be nominated for treason. (3 uses)
Influence Fate - Your vote to pardon or execute the accused will count twice. (2 uses)

Night Abilities

Guards! Have a guard protect you, granting you death immunity for the night. (3 uses (BD) / 2 uses(Evil))
(BD Queen Only, Starting Queen Only) Royal Scout - Determine if a player possesses royal blood. If they do, you will also know if they are Blue Dragon or not. (2 uses)
(Evil Queen Only, Starting Queen Only) Bastard Scout - Determine if a player possesses royal blood. If they do, remove their royal blood passive from them along with determining their faction. They cannot regain this passive, but will still appear royal to any classes that can check for royalty. (2 uses)

The Butler will have a choice on which highest royal they would like to poison

The Queen has a 50% chance of existing in any game. If they do not exist, no elections for Queen will be held.

Read full topic
